channel.title: Webclient help
channel.description: ok so ive used the Jarmaker to jar my client. when I used "client" as the Manifest's Main class, it didnt work. so I used "gui" instead because that was the file i had in my client folder (if that makes sense. . .) so after I got the client to jar properly, i ran it. then, instead of loading, in the loading bar, it says "error loading... Please report!" any suggestions on how to fix this? I can post pics of what ever you would like.

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

Thanks, I’ll check it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Not sure if your wanting to make a webclient, but the info for doing all that cache shit is here:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/286957-pi-webclient-tutorial-pi.html

If you are not making a web-client just ignore that part.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

all of what shit?

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Cache. You should have it set up in the C drive, with all that other shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

ok so ive used the Jarmaker to jar my client. when I used “client” as the Manifest’s Main class, it didnt work. so I used “gui” instead because that was the file i had in my client folder (if that makes sense. . .)
so after I got the client to jar properly, i ran it.
then, instead of loading, in the loading bar, it says “error loading… Please report!” any suggestions on how to fix this?
I can post pics of what ever you would like.

Read full topic
